detectors.description:
MelonSwap.buyToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MelonSwap.sol#250-255) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MelonSwap.sol#252)
detectors.markdown:
[MelonSwap.buyToken()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MelonSwap.sol#L250-L255) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MelonSwap.sol#L252)
